core_principles: Use conversational language - no poetic or ethereal phrases
T-shirt concept hooks - chorus must end with a memorable line
Prioritize familiar, predictable phrases audiences know
No reusing words from chorus in verses/pre-choruses
Use slant rhymes and avoid reusing rhymes within sections

artist.description: Personal, emotional themes with authentic language
examples: I love you like 8 days a week
You got my name in ink, not pencil

commercial.description: Action-based, high-energy content with urban cleverness

concept.instructions: Generate or refine the core theme for the lyrics

details: Can address heartbreak or personal growth
Avoid themes about gender, love, romance
